text: Any person, firm, or association violating any of the provisions of § 22- 1511 shall upon conviction thereof, be punished by a fine of not more than $500 or by imprisonment of not more than 60 days, or by both fine and imprisonment, in the discretion of the court. A corporation convicted of an offense under the provisions of § 22-1511 shall be fined not more than $500, and its president or such other officials as may be responsible for the conduct and management thereof shall be imprisoned not more than 60 days, in the discretion of the court.
